channel.title: [PI] Lower Case Letters PLEASE READ
channel.description:

I want the letters to be capital, please tell me which file to edit and the code.
Also; if anyone knows how, when you run the client, when you try logging in, the first letter you type automatically capitals?
Thanks, Dynasty
Please don't be dumb, just post a helpful post.
